```{r source, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

library (tidyverse)
library (kableExtra)
library (janitor)
library (lubridate)

functions_raw <- read_csv("tidy-tuesday-functions.csv") %>%
   clean_names()

functions <- functions_raw %>%
   mutate (data_week = mdy(data_week)) %>%
   select (data_week, data_description, package, function_name, lesson) %>%
   arrange (desc(data_week)) 

kable (functions) %>%
   kable_styling()

```
